title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, chat models or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs and model management.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing typed, async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool with conversation history, markdown rendering and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion via Ollama (supports StarCoder, CodeLlama).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app to chat with Ollama models (Windows, macOS, Linux).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats and generates images using Ollama back-end models.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to invoke Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await and streaming.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama instance for quick prototyping.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Llama 2 for answers.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama with GenServer-based client and telemetry events.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models, supports threads and app mentions.
